settings.heading: What are Average Shipping Times?
settings.row_content: Average shipping times typically range from 3 to 5 business days after the purchase date. Please be aware that these timelines may vary due to global shipping disruptions or other unforeseen circumstances. Thank you for your understanding.

settings.heading: Is My Device Covered by a Warranty?
settings.row_content: ХКАН provides a limited warranty on all devices, effective from the date of purchase. This warranty is available exclusively to the original end-user and requires a dated proof of purchase.

settings.heading: Do You Offer Wholesale?
settings.row_content: If you're interested in wholesale purchases, please contact us at info@xkah.com.
